Control Name: 2.1.2 Ensure S3 Bucket Policy allows HTTPS requests
Control Statement: By default, Amazon S3 allows both HTTP and HTTPS requests. To achieve only allowing access to Amazon S3 objects through HTTPS you also have to explicitly deny access to HTTP requests.
